collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (31 total Queries, 30 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN ( SELECT SUM(amount) FROM donations WHERE donations.campaign_id = campaigns.id AND donations.status = "received" ) >= campaigns.goal_amount THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful FROM `campaigns`

SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN ( SELECT SUM(amount) FROM donations WHERE donations.campaign_id = campaigns.id AND donations.status = "received" ) >= campaigns.goal_amount THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as successful FROM `campaigns` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created_at, "%Y-%m") <= '2025-12'
